STRAIT OF SICILY.
VESSEL, 24 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
VICINITY SOUTH OF LAMPEDUSA (35-30N 012-36E).
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 06 592 4145, 39 06 5908 4409,
FAX: 39 06 592 2737, 39 06 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: UFFICIO3.REPART03@MIT.GOV.ITBT.
